clues.description: The Englishman lives in the red house.
The green house is immediately to the right of the ivory house.
The Norwegian lives in the first house.
The man who smokes Kools lives in the yellow house.
The man who lives in the center house drinks milk.
The man who smokes Chesterfields lives next to the man with the fox.
The Kools smoker lives next to the man with the horse.
The Lucky Strike smoker drinks orange juice.
The Norwegian lives next to the blue house.
